Description

Inner class representing the JSON response returned by the Ollama API.

Represents a Classroom entity from the database.

Data Access Object (DAO) interface for performing CRUD operations on classrooms.

Controller for the main dashboard of the application.
DatabaseConnection
Provides access to a singleton database Connection instance for an SQLite database.
DatabaseConnectionTest
Basic tests for the DatabaseConnection class.
DatabaseSchemaManager
This class is responsible for managing the database schema, such as creating or dropping the users table.
DatabaseSchemaManagerTest
Integration tests for the DatabaseSchemaManager class using an IN-MEMORY SQLite database.

Represents a response object from the Ollama API.
OllamaResponseFetcher
Fetches responses from an Ollama API endpoint.
OllamaResponseTest
Unit tests for the OllamaResponse class.
ResponseListener
A functional interface for receiving asynchronous responses from the Ollama API.
SettingsController
Controller for managing user settings including updating profile details, changing passwords, deleting accounts, and font resizing.
SignUpController
Controller for the user sign-up screen.
SqliteAssessmentDAO
SQLite implementation of the AssessmentDAO interface.
SqliteAttendanceDAO
Implementation of the AttendanceDAO interface for SQLite.
SqliteClassroomDAO
SQLite implementation of the ClassroomDAO interface.
SqliteStudentDAO
SQLite implementation of the StudentDAO interface for interacting with the 'students' table.
SqliteUserDAO
This class implements the UserDAO interface specifically for a SQLite database.
SqliteUserDAOTest
Integration tests for the SqliteUserDAO class using an IN-MEMORY SQLite database.
Student
This class represents a student in the system.
StudentDAO
Defines the contract for Student Data Access Object (DAO) operations.

Controller class responsible for switching between different scenes in the application.

User Class, Represents a user as object within the system.

Defines the contract for User Data Access Object (DAO) operations.
UserSession
Manages the session for the currently logged-in user using the Singleton pattern.
